1524150545_1ErQYVi5mdM9hGb6uT4jg8iwGxcJB.body:
"measureable intelligence" in guppies has been proven to be easily manipulated by breeding "high iq" guppies with each other, making even smarter guppies. Also genetic tests do find differences in specific genes between the races, allowing things like "23andme" to happen where they can tell you all of your genetic/racial diversity through specific genes you have inherited.
I do kind of hate how everyone points at animals to compare them to humans though. "Clownfish change genders, so why shouldnt we?" Dolphins also rape each other, and frogs are cannibals, should we follow them too?

> [spukkinfaceship](#comment_11_13eTQePN4cvnxL9qFurmPFgHRTXMGNNbCy): is there a scientific term for the disorder whereby self-identified "white" people think they are somehow better than everybody else?

White people are the only people not "allowed" by general society to have a racial identity. Blacks, hispanics, jews, etc have very large in-group preferences. Something like 90% of hispanics use "hispanic" as their primary identity (as opposed to democrat, american), where as whites only do it about 30% of the time.
